contentfulProduct.seoDescription: This Lightweight Down Hooded Puffer Jacket is perfect by itself or as an extra layer when things get chilly. Filled with 100% responsibly sourced down that'll keep you warm and can be packed up to be taken with you on the go.
contentfulProduct.title: Lightweight Down Hooded Puffer Jacket

content.value: Buy any 3 activewear, downwear, cashmere or socks items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

This Lightweight Down Hooded Puffer Jacket is perfect by itself or as an extra layer when things get chilly. Filled with 100% responsibly sourced down that'll keep you warm and can be packed up to be taken with you on the go.
Shell: Light and durable 100% nylon
Fill: 650 fill-power, 90% RDS responsible down

RDS (Responsible Down Standard) is a global certification to ensure birds that supply down are not force-fed or live-plucked. The standard recognizes the best practices in animal welfare and ensures the down and feathers used in our products are sourced responsibly. RDS was developed with input from animal welfare groups, industry experts, brands, and retailers.
Temperature rating to 32°F
Comfortable stretch cuff and hem to help seal in warmth
Internal drop pockets for a hat or gloves
Packable into chest pocket
Produced in BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
Origin: Jiangxi, China
Model is 6'2 and wearing a size Medium
Given the nature of the premium lightweight Down used, it is normal to see some leakage of finer down filament on the first handful of wears; this will subside over time
Machine wash cold, inside out with like colors.  Do not use fabric softener.  Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low, do not iron, do not dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Shell: Light and durable 100% nylon
  • Fill: 650 fill-power, 90% RDS responsible down
  • RDS (Responsible Down Standard) is a global certification to ensure birds that supply down are not force-fed or live-plucked. The standard recognizes the best practices in animal welfare and ensures the down and feathers used in our products are sourced responsibly. RDS was developed with input from animal welfare groups, industry experts, brands, and retailers.
  • Temperature rating to 32°F
  • Comfortable stretch cuff and hem to help seal in warmth
  • Internal drop pockets for a hat or gloves
  • Packable into chest pocket
  • Produced in BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
  • Origin: Jiangxi, China
  • Model is 6'2 and wearing a size Medium
  • Given the nature of the premium lightweight Down used, it is normal to see some leakage of finer down filament on the first handful of wears; this will subside over time

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."

Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
